name: ChessGun
description:
1. How to play:

When you start the game, our "AI" named Joe will place a chess piece anywhere for you, your pieces are limited to 7.

Move your mouse to the chess piece's range, if you're within it's range you can click the left mouse button to shoot where your mouse is currently aiming.

Clicking on the piece itself will allow you to either remove it to try to get a better one or upgrade it to make it stronger.

After killing all the enemies, a new wave starts shown in the top right corner.

Your goal is to protect the king like in normal chess, if the enemies reach the king they'll damage him.

If the king gets destroyed, the game ends.
